channel.title: Projects on IDEAS Lab
channel.description: Recent content in Projects on IDEAS Lab

item.title: COVID-19: Rethinking building design and operations
item.description: Experiments and CFD studies for droplet and bioaerosol transmission inside building. A project funded by NUS COVID-19 Research Seed Grant.

item.title: Advanced machine learning based control for HVAC systems
item.description: Advanced machine learning based control for the HVAC systems

item.title: An automated framework for model predictive control
item.description: This study aims at improving the scalability of MPC by addressing modeling-related issues and establishing an automated framework.

item.title: Building lifecycle automatic data segmentation using natural language processing
item.description: Building lifecycle automatic data segmentation using natural language processing

item.title: Epwshiftr: an R package for creating future weather files under climate changes for building energy simulation
item.description: An R package for creating future weather files under climate changes for building energy simulation

item.title: Impacts of climate change on building energy systems
item.description: Impacts of climate change on building energy systems

item.title: Quantifying the impact of occupancy on ECMs' performance using building energy simulation
item.description: A framework for identifying and quantifying the impact of occupancy-related schedules on ECMs’ performance using building energy simulation

item.title: eplusr: A framework for integrating building energy simulation and data-driven analytics
item.description: A framework for seamless integration between Building Energy Simulation (BES) and data-driven analytics.

item.title: Generating certified energy models in Singapore through an M&V framework.
item.description: Generating certified energy models in Singapore through an M&V framework.An NUS project in collaboration with Professor Godfried L. Augenbroe (Georgia Institute of Technology)
